title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) for the update to complete. Currently, a busy cursor is not shown during this process.
EB: The update of the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature should take less time. Additionally, a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate that the update process is running.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a workspace with many projects. 
2. Go to the Export Zip feature. 
3. Select all projects. 
4. Choose the desired file types. 
5. Click on the 'Ok' button.
